Title: Allows persons 60 years or older in any housing project to keep common household pets
Summary: Allows persons 60 years or older to keep and care for common household pets in municipal housing; prevents eviction of such persons based on the ownership of pets; provides that any pet who poses a nuisance to the community may be removed; does not remove any pet owner from liability for the reasonable costs directly attributable to any damage caused by the pet.
LawCode: Add ยง223-c, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to the keeping of certain household pets by persons sixty years of age or older
